mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Tod, David to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tod, David
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling May 6 1863. By Telegraph from Columbus 1 1/2am 1863. Your dispatch recd have ordered a force of about four hundred 400 from Marietta to Parkersburg communicate with Col W R Putnam at Marietta David Tod Gov 23D89pd [page 2] Whelney- his name is Wich[?] Stone- has been in the Pine Center ans
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Tod, David
Columbus, Ohio
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
